hooks.name: gravityview/math/init
gk/gravitymath/scope/form/transform-meta-value

parameters.name: transformation
parameters.description: SQL statement to transform the meta value.

parameters.name: table
parameters.description: Table name or alias. Default: 'details' (alias for the entry meta table).

hooks.name: gk/gravitymath/summary/data
hooks.description: Modifies the calculation data before rendering the summary table.

hooks.name: gk/gravitymath/summary/entries
hooks.description: Modifies entries object used for calculations.

hooks.name: gk/gravitymath/summary/headers
hooks.description: Modifies the table headers before rendering the summary table.

hooks.name: gk/gravitymath/summary/template
hooks.description: Modifies the template used to display the summary table.

hooks.name: gk/gravitymath/table-footer-calculation/supported-fields-schema
hooks.description: Filters the supported fields schema value.

hooks.name: gk/gravitymath/use_db_cache
gravityview/math/accuracy_message

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: Default: "* Results may not be accurate.".

hooks.name: gravityview/math/admin_notice

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: Default: "You can only see this message because you are logged in and have permissions.".

hooks.name: gravityview/math/aggregate_data/modify_field_value
gravityview/math/debug
gravityview/math/debug_message

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: Error data to be displayed (empty array or [code, leads, input_id, default_value]).

hooks.name: gravityview/math/entries/visible
gravityview/math/no_results_message
gravityview/math/precision

parameters.name: float_precision
parameters.description: The number of decimal places to use as a maximum precision level.

hooks.name: gravityview/math/sanitize
gravityview/math/shortcode/before
gravityview/math/shortcode/default_value
gravityview/math/shortcode/output
gravityview/math/suppress_errors

parameters.name: suppress_errors
parameters.description: True: don't show the errors. False: show the errors. Default: false.

hooks.name: gravityview/math/table_footer_calculation/calculation_result
gravityview/math/table_footer_calculation/format_duration_field_calculation_result
gravityview/math/table_footer_calculation/math_shortcode

parameters.name: shortcode
parameters.description: The Math shortcode being used for calculation.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The scope in which the calculation is being performed.

parameters.name: field_id
parameters.description: The ID of the field being calculated.

parameters.name: view_id
parameters.description: The ID of the GravityView view.

parameters.name: form_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Gravity Forms form.

parameters.name: calculation_type
parameters.description: The type of calculation being performed (e.g., 'count', 'sum', 'avg').

parameters.name: field
parameters.description: Data about the field being calculated.

parameters.name: column
parameters.description: Data about the column in the view.

parameters.name: formula
parameters.description: The math formula used for the calculation.

parameters.name: process_empty_meta
parameters.description: Whether to process fields with empty meta (1 or 0).

parameters.name: multi_select_count_method
parameters.description: Method for counting multi-select field choices (count individually or as one).

hooks.example:
/**
 * Filter gravityviewmathtable_footer_calculationmath_shortcode
 *
 * @param string $shortcode The Math shortcode being used for calculation.
 * @param string $↳ $scope The scope in which the calculation is being performed.
 * @param string $↳ $field_id The ID of the field being calculated.
 * @param int $↳ $view_id The ID of the GravityView view.
 * @param int $↳ $form_id The ID of the Gravity Forms form.
 * @param string $↳ $calculation_type The type of calculation being performed (e.g., 'count', 'sum', 'avg').
 * @param array $↳ $field Data about the field being calculated.
 * @param array $↳ $column Data about the column in the view.
 * @param string $↳ $formula The math formula used for the calculation.
 * @param string $↳ $process_empty_meta Whether to process fields with empty meta (1 or 0).
 * @param string $↳ $multi_select_count_method Method for counting multi-select field choices (count individually or as one).
 * @return string Modified shortcode
 */
add_filter( 'gravityviewmathtable_footer_calculationmath_shortcode', 'my_custom_gravityviewmathtable_footer_calculationmath_shortcode_filter', 10, 11 );

function my_custom_gravityviewmathtable_footer_calculationmath_shortcode_filter($shortcode, $↳ $scope, $↳ $field_id, $↳ $view_id, $↳ $form_id, $↳ $calculation_type, $↳ $field, $↳ $column, $↳ $formula, $↳ $process_empty_meta, $↳ $multi_select_count_method) {
    // Modify $shortcode as needed

    return $shortcode;
}

hooks.name: gravityview/math/thousands_sep

parameters.name: thousands_sep
parameters.description: The thousands separator for numbers. Normally either a comma or dot.
